title: Plants vs. Zombies v5.0.0
description:
Description
Get ready to soil your plants as a mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home. Use your arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants Ã¢â‚¬â€ Peashooters, Wall-nuts, Cherry Bombs and more Ã¢â‚¬â€ to mulchify 26 types of zombies before they break down your door.
One of the top tower-defense action games ever, Plants vs. ZombiesÃ¢â€žÂ¢ features zombies with their own special skills, so you'll need to think fast and plant faster to have a successful strategy and combat them all. But be careful how you use your limited supply of greens and seeds Ã¢â‚¬â€ as you dash to battle the fun-dead, obstacles like a setting sun, creeping fog and a swimming pool add to the challenge.
Plants vs. Zombies is a favorite for all ages, from those who grew up with classic arcade action games to kids. The fun never dies!
WINNER OF OVER 30 GAME OF THE YEAR AWARDS*
Game Features
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Conquer zombies in all 50 levels of Adventure mode Ã¢â‚¬â€ through day, night and fog, in a swimming pool and on the rooftop
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Battle 26 types of zombies including Pole-Vaulters, Snorkelers and Bucketheads, each with its own special skills
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Earn 49 powerful perennial plants and collect coins to buy a pet snail, power-ups and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Open the Almanac to see all the plants and zombies, plus amusing "facts" and quotes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Collect 47 fun-dead achievements and show off your zombie-zapping prowess
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Enjoy all the zombie-zapping fun of the hit PC/Mac game Ã¢â‚¬â€ fully optimized for Android
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Hilarious graphics, great soundtrack and a bonus music video
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Need coins for great new stuff? Buy up to 600,000 coins right from the Main Menu
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Includes all the mini-games and the full features of the original game
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Made by PopCap, the creators of Bejeweled, the #1 puzzle game in the world
Download today to stem a zombie attack on your Android device!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*PC/Mac version voted Game of the Year by over 30 publications including PC Gamer, USAToday.com and Chicago Sun-Times
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Language Support: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish
Requirements: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports HVGA, FWVGA-WVGA and qHD resolutions.
